item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Are a Lobbyist’s Dream
item.description: It’s merit that should decide success, not political connections.

item.title: Republicans’ Modest Medicaid Changes
item.description: The House bill extracts savings through various good-government measures instead of revisiting repealing Obamacare.

item.title: Trump as Art Czar: No, Stranger Things Haven’t Happened
item.description: The NEH gets a second wind, the Kennedy Center will get millions for building rehab, a museum director gets the axe, and will Bette Davis get a statue...

item.title: Workers Need More Transparency from Unions
item.description: Many workers feel intimidated by unions and won’t ask for relevant information. The onus should be on the unions to proactively provide it.

item.title: Stanley Fischer: The New Monetarist
item.description: Stanley Fischer made the world of ideas better, richer, fuller. He built out a research agenda that played Milton Friedman’s monetarist tune in a new ...
